title: South Korea, a science spending champion, proposes cutbacks
description: Sudden revamp would trim basic research spending while boosting biomedical innovation, space, and other fields

title: Can ancient irrigation canals water thirsty crops in Morocco today?
description: Remote sensing identifies 2000-year-old canals that may provide water in an era of climate change

title: ‘Surprising and super cool.’ Quantum algorithm offers faster way to hack internet encryption
description: Scheme to factor giant numbers could be more efficient than 30-year-old Shor’s algorithm
